id.description: Unique identifier for this Application, is also used to link the Application to the supporting materials

courtApplicationCases.description: Array of the cases that are linked to this application

applicationParticulars.description: The particulars of the application when not covered by the associated document

applicationDecisionSoughtByDate.description: The date by which a judicial decision is sought

applicant.description: The party applying to court to make a judicial decision on a matter

respondents.description: An array of the parties answering to a matter before the court

thirdParties.description: An array of the 3rd parties associated to the court matter.  Required to be notified

outOfTimeReason.description: The rationale for seeking a judicial decision when the regulatory timeline has surpassed.  This only applies to application
